bikeep.name: Concord
bikeep.lockerInfo:
{"#cdata-section":"

64 on-demand BikeLink lockers are available at this station. Visit the Bike Section for more BikeLink locker information.

12 single user keyed lockers are located at this station. Call Customer Services at 510-464-7133 to ask about availability of keyed bicycle lockers. Many stations have a wait list. Download an application form for keyed bicycle lockers.

"}
